snippet: The show at the Museum of American Art, History and Carriages, which has interactive elements, includes pop songs, newsreel images and period furnishings and clothes.
abstract: Exhibit Long Island, America's 1950s Frontier, at the Long Island Museum of American Art, History and Carriages, displays pop songs, newsreel images and period furnishings and clothes from a time when Long Island was changing rapidly (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The show at the Museum of American Art, History and Carriages, which has interactive elements, includes pop songs, newsreel images and period furnishings and clothes.

headline.seo: ‘Long Island, America’s 1950s Frontier,’ Is at the Long Island Museum
